comment: Chill & easy class. There's a discussion boards weekly with 1 post on Thursday and replies Sunday. Reasonable word count & you'll get late credit. Not a hard grader and there's 3 tests. also a journal due at the end of the course that you just answer prompts every unit. 1 video assignment but it's super easy and the discussions can be fun.

Do make sure you actually read the textbook. Unfortunately there is a lot to read and the discussion posts, quizzes, and lecture videos will NOT prepare you for the midterm and final. He responds quickly to emails, participates in the discussions, and is generally very involved with the class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: He genuinely cares about his students. He responds to emails quickly. He's very understanding and there is no reason as to why you shouldn't receive an A in this class. He gives lesson videos about the units and goes in depth about topics. I would only say keep up with the course journal, if you do it last minute it will be time consuming! AMAZING!
LOVEEE him. He is really communicative and kind and always gave me the nicest replies to my discussion posts. Made it an easy, positive communications class. Easy A if you do the work.

OMG, this professor is amazing! There are a few reviews about him. There's nothing I need to say, but besides that, he is passionate about what he teaches and ensures that you submit assignments on time, as he does not accept late work. AMAZING professor.

This professor was amazing. I would definitely take him again by any chance. He gives really good feedback on discussion post. Super super easy class just do the work and take notes. No lock down webcam. There's a video presentation you have to do which was super easy and he also is a fast grader. he cares. We need professor like him. TAKEE HIM.
Weekly Discussion posts, a final, midterm, and quizzes no lockdown or camera. Two projects very easy. Fast grader, very kind and understanding. I would recommend him to anyone
